channel.title: My very first (r2)

item.title: My very first (r2)
item.dc:creator: @vonl vonl
item.description:
@vonl wrote:

you have typos and i dont think that is your script
This is from infantr001:s start coding guide

[scar]program autotalker;

{.include SRL\SRL.scar}

var
wordstyped:integer;

//SETUP\
const
SentenceToType=‘Type Sentence Here’;
progress=1 //How often in minutes you want your progress report to print
//END SETUP\

procedure talk;
begin
repeat
TypeSend(SentenceToType+chr(13));
wordstyped :=wordstyped + 1;
Wait(750+random(250));
Until(false)
end;

Procedure ProgressReport;
begin
ClearDebug;
Writeln(’[]—////////////////////\\\\\\\\\\—[]’);
Writeln(’ Thanks for using Infantry001s’‘s ‘);
Writeln(’ Tutorial Auto-Talker ‘);
Writeln(’ Worked for:’ +ScriptTime2(2));
Writeln(’ Sentences typed:’ +IntToStr(wordstyped));
Writeln(’[]—////////////////////\\\\\\\\\\—[]’);
end;

begin
SetTimeOut(progress * 60,‘ProgressReport’);
ActivateClient;
talk;
end.
[/scar]

But i might be wrong, and im not here to spoil your fun. Have fun scripting

item.title: My very first (r2)
item.dc:creator: @megamen1 megamen1
item.description:
@megamen1 wrote:

This is my very first
[scar] program autotalker;

{.include SRL/SRL.scar}

var
wordstyped:integer;

//SETUP\
const
sentencetotype=‘type sentence here’;
progress=1 //how often you want to talk
//END SETUP\

procedure talk;
begin
repeat
typesend(sentencetotype+chr(13));
wordstyped :=wordstyped + 1
wait(750+random(250)0;
until(false)
end;

procedure progressreport;
begin
cleardebug;
writein(’[]-----------------------------------[]’);
writein(’ thx for using drako emson’‘s’);
writein(’ auto-talker ‘);
writein(’ worked for:’ +scripttime2(2));
writein(’ sentences typed;’ +intostr(wordstyped));
writein(’[]-----------------------------------[]’);
end;

begin
settimeour(progress * 60,‘progressreport’);
activateclient;
talk;
end.[/scar]
